relatedBlades.title: Project Safekeeping: Zero Trust cybersecurity for critical infrastructure
relatedBlades.copy:
![teams-access-zero-trust-hero (2)](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/3KklSIm1KvIQQaEreFR2QY/f793bc30f8fcd008c33f08edc09ef763/teams-access-zero-trust-hero__2_.png)

Under-resourced organizations that are vital to the basic functioning of our global communities face relentless cyber attacks, threatening basic needs for health, safety and security.  

Cloudflare's mission is to help build a better Internet. 
It is our pleasure to introduce our newest Impact initiative: Project Safekeeping. We will help support these vulnerable infrastructure by providing our enterprise-level Zero Trust cybersecurity services to eligible organizations at no cost, with no time limit.

__Available services__

- Cloudflare Gateway
- Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
- Cloud Email Security (CES)
- Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
- Cloud Security Access Broker (CASB)
- Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
- Web Application Firewall (WAF)
- DDoS Mitigation

These services are only available to eligible organizations. To be eligible, Project Safekeeping participants must be:

- Located in Japan, Australia, Germany, Portugal, and/or the United Kingdom.
- Considered critical infrastructure by governments in their respective localities.
- Approximately up to 50 people and/or less than USD $10 million in annual revenue/balance sheet total.  

Fill out the form to apply today.
